0:
for i in $(seq 1 6); do
  psql \
    --host=postgresql-rw \
    --dbname=lemmy \
    --username=lemmy \
    --command="DELETE FROM received_activity WHERE published < NOW() - INTERVAL '14 days';" \
  && exit \
  || sleep 5
done
exit 1

access_by_lua_block {
  local apiKey = ngx.var.authHeader1
  if apiKey ~= nil then
    local args = ngx.req.get_uri_args()
    args.token = apiKey
    ngx.req.set_uri_args(args)
  end
}

add_header Content-Type application/javascript;
return 200 "self.addEventListener('install', event => { event.waitUntil(self.skipWaiting()) })";

nodeAffinity:
  preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
    - weight: 60
      preference:
        matchExpressions:
          - key: kubernetes.io/arch
            operator: In
            values:
              - amd64
              - i386
              - i686
              - x86

for i in $(seq 1 180); do
  test -f /host/etc/cni/net.d/10-calico.conflist && exit 0
  sleep 1
done
exit 1
